text:
Kartika Tamara Liotard (26 June 1971 – 1 August 2020) was a Dutch politician. She was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 2004 to 2014. She was formerly a member of the Socialist Party. Liotard was vice-chair of the EUL–NGL group. She was born in Voorburg, South Holland.
Liotard died on 1 August 2020, aged 49.
